metadata.name: Boreas
metadata.description:
When the north wind’s icy breath chills the air and freezes time, you know life is nothing but this single moment lasting to eternity. Loaded with meaning. Full of opportunities. Still, yet ever-changing. Seize it.

As the first piece of [the Morgenrot Collection](https://morgenrot.aurora.gallery), Boreas symbolizes this unique moment, in which you suddenly know. Know that you are on the right path. Know that big things lie ahead. Know that there is meaning in what you do. It reflects the magical tension of deep calmness and thrilling anticipation defining this liminal moment.

The Morgenrot Collection delicately mirrors the radiating beauty of our inner world unfolding in light and form.
